title: Play
question: Identify any added performances.
help: Alongside the main performance, additional plays were often performed on the same day. A rectangle should be drawn around each of these added performances. Any notes about upcoming or past performances can be ignored.

title: Title
question: Identify each title (and subtitle).
help: A single rectangle should be drawn around the title and any subtitles, or alternative titles of each play.

title: Actor and Role
question: Identify each actor and role.
help: A single rectangle should be drawn around around each actor and role.

title: Dates
question: Identify the dates of performance.
help: Draw a single rectangle around the dates of the main performance (and any added performances), if given. Any notes about upcoming or past performances can be ignored.
